constantValues: An idea belonging to a portal Idea Forum.

members.name: ideaId
members.description: Shows the entity instances.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows whether the idea is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.description: Shows whether the idea is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Idea' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.description: Select the idea's status.

addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: name

constantValues: Shows the name or title of the idea.

members.description: Shows the name or title of the idea.

members.name: approved

constantValues: Indicates whether or not this idea is approved for display.

members.description: Indicates whether or not this idea is approved for display.

members.name: authorEmail

constantValues: Shows the email address for the author of this idea.

members.description: Shows the email address for the author of this idea.

members.name: authorName

constantValues: Shows the name for the author of this idea.

members.description: Shows the name for the author of this idea.

members.name: commentPolicy

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Indicates the comment policy to be used for this idea.

members.description: Indicates the comment policy to be used for this idea.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'commentPolicy_display' is added to the 'Idea' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'commentPolicy'
addSupportingAttribute.name: commentPolicy_display

members.name: copy

constantValues: Type a description of the idea.

members.description: Type a description of the idea.

constantValues: Shows the IP address of the user when they submitted this idea.

members.description: Shows the IP address of the user when they submitted this idea.

members.name: adxCreatedByUsername

constantValues: Shows the system username of the user when they submitted this idea.

members.description: Shows the system username of the user when they submitted this idea.

members.name: submittedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time this idea was submitted.

members.description: Shows the date and time this idea was submitted.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: The parent idea forum that this idea belongs to.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The parent idea forum that this idea belongs to.

members.name: partialURL

constantValues: Shows the URL path fragment used to generate a URL for this idea.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: The author of the idea's status.

constantValues: Type an abstract of this idea.

members.description: Type an abstract of this idea.

constantValues: Shows the total number of voters for this idea.

members.description: Shows the total number of voters for this idea.

members.name: votesDown

constantValues: Shows the number of down votes this idea has received.

members.description: Shows the number of down votes this idea has received.

constantValues: Shows the total number of votes for this idea.

members.description: Shows the total number of votes for this idea.

constantValues: Shows the calculated number of up votes minus down votes.

members.description: Shows the calculated number of up votes minus down votes.

constantValues: Shows the total votes casted on the idea.
